data.title: Home
data.description: Anthropic is an AI safety and research company that's working to build reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems.

*   Claude.ai
    
    Meet Claude 3.7 Sonnet
    ----------------------
    
    Claude 3.7 Sonnet, our most intelligent AI model, is now available.
    
    [Talk to Claude](https://claude.ai/)
    
*   API
    
    Build with Claude
    -----------------
    
    Create AI-powered applications and custom experiences using Claude.
    
    [Learn more](https://www.anthropic.com/api)
    

Claude 3.7 Sonnet and Claude Code

Introducing Claude 3.7 Sonnet, our most intelligent model yet and the first hybrid reasoning model. We’re also launching Claude Code, an agentic tool for coding.

[Read the announcement](https://www.anthropic.com/news/claude-3-7-sonnet)

[Model details Claude 3.7 Sonnet](https://www.anthropic.com/claude/sonnet)[Research insights Claude's extended thinking](https://www.anthropic.com/news/visible-extended-thinking)

Our Work
--------

[Product ### Claude for Enterprise Sep 4, 2024](https://www.anthropic.com/news/claude-for-enterprise)[Alignment · Research ### Constitutional AI: Harmlessness from AI Feedback Dec 15, 2022](https://www.anthropic.com/research/constitutional-ai-harmlessness-from-ai-feedback)[Announcements ### Core Views on AI Safety: When, Why, What, and How Mar 8, 2023](https://www.anthropic.com/news/core-views-on-ai-safety)

![Image 1: Working office](https://www.anthropic.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2F62eedd3c49a10081ea84946f3e02b5840ffcb61c-1152x864.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

Work with Anthropic
-------------------

Anthropic is an AI safety and research company based in San Francisco. Our interdisciplinary team has experience across ML, physics, policy, and product. Together, we generate research and create reliable, beneficial AI systems.

[See open roles](https://www.anthropic.com/jobs)

[](https://www.anthropic.com/)
